page.title: 17 WHITLEY BAY POLICE STATION.
page.content: In W/B the main Police station is situ- -ated off a major shopping highstreet. 66 policeman are based there headed by Mr Emberly a Super-Intendent who has available to him 10 policeman 24 hours a day due to a shift system of 8 hours. 10 CID officers are based at the stati- -on and at times additional officers are called for.At these times such as during demonstrations a van of 15 SPG (Special Patrol Group)officers are used but usually the station handles crimes by itself.At these times the general trend of crime is towards house burgla- -ries and around the many pubs and clu- -bs drunken and disorderly behaviour as well as an increase in driving offences .Also becoming more prevalent in W/B is rape and juvenile delinquency.Over the past 6months 2500 crimes were committed in the first 6 months of 1985 with approximately 50% being solved.
